name: UTakeRecorderPanel
doc: Take recorder UI panel interop object

methods.name: CanStartRecording
methods.doc: Whether the panel is ready to start recording

methods.name: ClearPendingTake
methods.doc: * Clear the pending take level sequence

methods.name: GetFrameRate
methods.doc: Access the frame rate for this take

methods.name: GetLastRecordedLevelSequence
methods.doc: Access the last level sequence that was recorded

methods.name: GetLevelSequence
methods.doc: Access the level sequence for this take

methods.name: GetMode
methods.doc: Get the mode that the panel is currently in

methods.name: GetSources
methods.doc: Access the sources that are to be (or were) used for recording this take

methods.name: GetTakeMetaData
methods.doc: Access take meta data for this take

methods.name: SetFrameRate
methods.doc: Set the frame rate for this take

methods.name: SetFrameRateFromTimecode
methods.doc: Set if the frame rate is set from the Timecode frame rate

methods.name: SetupForEditing
methods.doc: Setup this panel as an editor for the specified take preset asset.

methods.name: SetupForRecording_LevelSequence
methods.doc:
Setup this panel such that it is ready to start recording using the specified
level sequence asset as a template for the recording.

methods.name: SetupForRecording_TakePreset
methods.doc:
Setup this panel such that it is ready to start recording using the specified
take preset as a template for the recording.

methods.name: SetupForRecordingInto_LevelSequence
methods.doc:
Setup this panel such that it is ready to start recording using the specified
level sequence asset to record into.

methods.name: SetupForViewing
methods.doc: Setup this panel as a viewer for a previously recorded take.

methods.name: StartRecording
methods.doc: Start recording with the current take

methods.name: StopRecording
methods.doc: Stop recording with the current take
